![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/00e7895f-c0e4-4c13-9e0e-9ae890fac9cd)

### Running Locally

```bash
# Generate Templates
$ make templ

## To compile tailwind
$ make css

# In another terminal
$ make dev
```

To build

```bash
$ make build

# TO build AND run the project
$ make run
```
